mapper.insert: INSERT INTO purchases ( count, price, dc_price, name, user_record_index, code, menu_name_kr, opt_size, opt_type, receipt_id ) VALUES ( #{count}, #{price}, #{dc_price}, #{name}, #{user_record_index}, #{code}, #{menu_name_kr}, #{opt_size}, #{opt_type}, #{receipt_id} )
mapper.select: UPDATE purchases SET receipt_status = '1', cancel_date = 'now()', update_date = 'now()' WHERE receipt_id = #{receiptId} AND receipt_status = '0' RETURNING *
